name: Shroom Hunter (Patsui Games)
description:
Shroom Hunter

Ludum Dare 52 entry 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/shroom-hunter

Harvest mushroom parts and sell them at the market for profit in this Vampire Surviving Roguelike Tycoon extravaganza thing!

  • WASD to move
  • MOUSE 1 to fire Uzi
  • MOUSE 2 to fire Shotty

Solo devd by me
